pr_title: Check for null client info from thread local to avoid NPE

timeline.message:
Check for null client info from thread local to avoid NPE

Error observed during deployment when users bounced to new server.
Indicates session replication probably not working but might as well
get exception with message rather than NPE.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
+ remoteAddr + " because client ip at time of cookie creation unknown");
+ remoteAddr + " because client ip at time of cookie creation is unknown");
timeline.author: mmoayyed

timeline.body: Would be best to move these up to the class level. Not sure how Override works with javadocs in general.
